name: Teacher Kris in the SchoolHouse!
description:
In this game you have to find all 7 notebooks of your friend, because you are so great friends with him, that's why you went after them, but it's not so easy to get them, because teacher Kris and his friends will interfere with you! So avoid this teacher when he is angry! The teacher will also give you a couple of simple tasks, in return you will get your notebook!
